properties.question: What is the primary characteristic of mucocutaneous lesions in pemphigus vulgaris as seen in the photograph?
properties.option_b: Tender or flaccid bubbles with jagged edges
properties.option_d: Vesicles filled with clear fluid and smooth surfaces
